overview: Bisma belongs to a rich family. She meets Faraz and falls for him. He is from a middle class family. Bima's mother is against this marriage. But love triumphs for the moment.
tagline: isma belongs to a rich family. She meets Faraz and falls for him. He is from a middle class family. Bima's mother is against this marriage. But love triumphs for the moment.
title: Wedding
